description: Our personalized name puzzles make the perfect gift!A gift you love giving, our wooden name puzzles are a wonderful learning toy to give a toddler or baby for Easter, Birthdays, baby showers and as a new baby gift.  They are a fun "just because I love you gift" and a great way to encourage letter and name recognition.•	FREE Shipping!•	Super cute gift shows you care•	Fun and educational•	Display Stand available separately (see link below)Puzzles are a fun learning toy that encourage name recognition, spelling, and fine motor skills.  They are time tested and never go out of style.  Made of high quality baltic birch, our puzzles are 4.5" tall and the length varies based on the length of the name.  The puzzles typically range from 10" long, to a maximum length of 30" based on the number of letters and shapes. The letters are approximately 3" high, the perfect size to grab for your young learner.  All of the puzzle pieces are raised, making it easy to get them out and play with. We use non-toxic paint, eco-friendly ink, and a food grade non-toxic wood sealer that is child friendly.COLOR OPTIONS:  Please choose from below, or send us a message to customize with any available colorsShown on Color Options Page 1-1. The number of colors used varies based on the number of letters in a name.  Due to differences in monitors and devices, the colors may appear slightly different than shown on your screen.  If you have a specific request, please leave it in the Notes to Seller and we are happy to accommodate you if we can.  We are not able to include special characters like hyphens or apostrophes in our puzzles.  Our puzzles only include uppercase letters, without any special characters.FREE SHIPPING: We offer FREE 2 Day Shipping on most orders via UPS 2 Day Air.  In select locations that we are unable to ship UPS, such as PO Boxes, Hawaii, and Alaska, as well as rural locations without UPS delivery, we ship via USPS Priority Mail.RETURNS: We do not accept returns on customized items. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out before placing your order. Thank you!

description: MORE DESIGN VARIATIONS HERE:https://www.etsy.com/shop/HandicraftsMill?section_id=29395189Handmade and Hand Painted Wooden Easter Egg in original Ukrainian Petrykivka painting technique.It can be a perfect Gift Idea for any occasion: Birthday Gift for Her, Valentine's Day Gift for Girlfriend, Christmas Gift for Mom, Wedding Gift Idea, Mother's Day Gift or just Perfect Gift to anyone.The item is ready to ship!Product material: wood (birch)Paints: art oil paintsCoating: four layers of glossy varnishPackaging: individual cardboard boxDimensions:Diameter: 70 mm / 2.76"Height - 96 mm / 3.78"Height with stand - 130 mm / 5.12"The video of the creation process can be viewed on the main page:https://www.etsy.com/shop/HandicraftsMillPlease note that each product is a hand painted work of authorship, therefore slight differences in painting are allowed.But this means that you will be the only owner in the world of a unique product!!!PETRYKIVKA PAINTING is the Ukrainian arts and crafts patterned folk style that originated from the village of Petrykivka.Petrykivka painting is traditionally dominated by floral motifs. The floral ornament depicts various flowers (asters, dahlias, roses, and chamomile) and fruits, which are combined in fantasy compositions of plants and shrubs. Sometimes floral patterns are combined with the images of people, birds and animals.In 2012, the Petrykivka painting was recognized as part of the National Intangible Cultural Heritage, and, in 2013, it was included in the Representative List of the Intangible Cultural Heritage of Humanity by UNESCO.

description: MORE DESIGN VARIATIONS HERE:https://www.etsy.com/shop/HandicraftsMill?section_id=29395189Handmade and Hand Painted Wooden Easter Egg in original Ukrainian Petrykivka painting technique.It can be a perfect Gift Idea for any occasion: Birthday Gift for Her, Valentine's Day Gift for Girlfriend, Christmas Gift for Mom, Wedding Gift Idea, Mother's Day Gift or just Perfect Gift to anyone.The item is ready to ship!Product material: wood (birch)Paints: art oil paintsCoating: four layers of glossy varnishPackaging: individual cardboard boxDimensions:Diameter: 70 mm / 2.76"Height - 96 mm / 3.78"Height with stand - 130 mm / 5.12"The video of the creation process can be viewed on the main page:https://www.etsy.com/shop/HandicraftsMillPlease note that each product is a hand painted work of authorship, therefore slight differences in painting are allowed.But this means that you will be the only owner in the world of a unique product!!!PETRYKIVKA PAINTING is the Ukrainian arts and crafts patterned folk style that originated from the village of Petrykivka.Petrykivka painting is traditionally dominated by floral motifs. The floral ornament depicts various flowers (asters, dahlias, roses, and chamomile) and fruits, which are combined in fantasy compositions of plants and shrubs. Sometimes floral patterns are combined with the images of people, birds and animals.In 2012, the Petrykivka painting was recognized as part of the National Intangible Cultural Heritage, and, in 2013, it was included in the Representative List of the Intangible Cultural Heritage of Humanity by UNESCO.
